channel.title: LCallDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from LCallDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Dem House Minority Whip Walks Back Israel Genocide Comment
item.description: House Minority Whip Katherine Clark, D-Mass., clarified comments she made last week that Israel was committing genocide in Gaza.

item.title: ESSEX FILES: A Huge Lesson in Compassion for Meijer

item.description: LA Mayor Karen Bass holds back Palisades fire after-action report amid federal investigation, drawing criticism from community groups seeking answers.

item.title: They/Them Park Ranger Who Unfurled Trans Flag On El Capitan, Gets a Permanent Vacation
Trump slams mail-in ballots as corrupt, but may not have the power to derail them
item.description: Trump, citing Putin, vowed to end mail-in ballots with an executive order, despite both the facts and the Constitution’s limits on his power.
